item.title: After a Desert Car Chase Where a Mystery Man Pursued Her at 100 MPH, Izabel Pakzad Turned the ‘Terrifying’ Drive Into a Ferocious Directorial Debut — Fantasia
item.description: While Izabel Pakzad’s “Find Your Friends” joins Hollywood’s storied history of films inspired by true events, the events in question are rarely this jaw-dropping. Years ago, Pa
